H0.text: Jonas Salk is the scientist credited with developing the polio vaccine.

H1.text: Neil Armstrong is credited for the development of the polio vaccine.

H2.text: Albert Einstein is credited for the development of the polio vaccine.

H3.text: Jacques Cousteau is credited for the development of the polio vaccine.

A4.text: Jonas Edward Salk was an American virologist and medical researcher who developed one of the first successful polio vaccines.

A5.text: Salk's inactivated polio vaccine came into use in 1955.
